item.title: The bottom in Oracle may be in. This options trade lets you ride the gains while limiting risk
Nvidia has rarely been cheaper the last 10 years. Bernstein says buy it for 2026
item.description: You'll be hard pressed to find Nvidia at a bigger discount that it is now, according to Bernstein.

item.title: Stay away from Lyft as autonomous vehicles disrupt ridesharing market, says Wedbush
item.description: Lyft is enjoying a strong year in 2025. That won't carry over into 2026, according to Wedbush.

item.title: This power generator stock has struggled recently. Wells Fargo thinks there’s a buying opportunity
item.description: Analyst Praneeth Satish upgraded the power generator maker to overweight from equal weight.

item.title: Friday's big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
item.description: The S&P 500 rose on Thursday, snapping a four-day string of losses after a softer-than-expected consumer inflation reading for November.
